title: Secret Meeting
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>Umi-chan, over here!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Thanks for waiting, Honoka.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Kotori-chan didn’t see you, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Of course not. She didn’t see you either, right Honoka?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Me? I don’t think so......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>You think!? That’s a problem. We cannot be seen having this secret meeting, period.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>So, should we change our location?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>......Let’s do that, just to be safe. Because this is one of the most important missions of the year!the m<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Right, we have to make proper preparations for everything, whether it’s for a live concert or a party!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Exactly! Now, let’s check the perimeter and move!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
